title: [J_J_Knight]Blue Shoes #1 (New Adult Erotic Romance)(azw, epub,
description:
Book Description
Publication Date: September 4, 2014
"Another breathtaking JJ Knight book. Hot romance + suspenseful mystery = total addiction. FIVE SCREAMING STARS!!!"
Everyone wants a piece of sexy singer Dylan Wolf in the new rock star erotic romance, Blue Shoes.

Jess Rivera is a young music executive engaged to Morris Music's hottest rock star: Dylan Wolf.

She wears a gorgeous diamond ring on her finger, and everyone wants to know when they're getting married.

Between Dylan's screaming fans who chase him everywhere, plus their glamorous L.A. lifestyle, the couple can hardly get a moment alone together.

That's why they're planning a secret wedding.

But when a visit to a bridal gown boutique goes terribly wrong, all their romantic plans are ruined.

Sometimes it feels like the whole world is against the couple's love. Is it just bad luck, or is someone trying to destroy Dylan Wolf?

BLUE SHOES Volume 1 is the first in a 3-part series about Jess Rivera and Dylan Wolf. This is the same couple from JJ KNIGHT's 5-part REVENGE series, but BLUE SHOES can be enjoyed without having read the earlier books.
"Drama. Suspense. Passion. Blue Shoes is another hit romance from JJ Knight!"

CreateSpace Independent Publishing Platform | English | September 7, 2014 | ISBN: 1501080032 | 162 pages | azw, epub, lrf, mobi | 1 mb

More About the Author
Biography
JJ KNIGHT is currently releasing BLUE SHOES, a follow-up to her popular REVENGE series.

New reader? You can start with BLUE SHOES #1, or with REVENGE #1. Both series are set at Morris Music and follow the same characters.

Also available: UNCAGED LOVE. New readers start with UNCAGED LOVE #1. This series features Colt, a pro MMA fighter, and Jo, the girl he rescues. This series is close to JJ's heart, and she's taken a number of bruises and sore muscles with a personal trainer to research the roles.
